input.content: For each pair of words, determine whether their Russian translations rhyme. If they do, output the pair of rhyming words in Russian. If not, output NONE.
book, pen

data.sampled:
boks, pen

Note: Russian language does not have true rhyme like English, and instead, there are different types of rhymes called "similar rhyme" and "subordinate rhyme". In this case, "boks" being similar rhyme to "pen", and "pen" being similar rhyme to "oks" because of their last vowel.
